NCIM Units Library
==================

Not Crashing Into Mars (NCIM) is a simple lightweight units library for gamegine


Generic NCIM Functions
======================
.. automodule:: gamegine.utils.NCIM.ncim
     :members:

Base Measurements
=================
.. automodule:: gamegine.utils.NCIM.basic
     :members:

     :members:

     :members:

     :members:

     :members:
